Cisco SDM and Cisco IOS CLI Cisco IOS CLI Cisco SDM User Interface Router Configuration Method Expertise in Cisco Device Configuration -T) Help Features Router Flash Memory Requirements Availability When Used

  • Telnet session
    • Text-based Cisco commands Depends on configuration task Command prompt based Covered by IOS image All Cisco devices

  • Step through configuration of devices without CLI knowledge required
